[[inst_ld_umax]]
==== LD.UMAX

*Syntax:* ld.umax<.{aq, rl, f, aqrl, aqf, rlf, aqrlf}> [SrcL], SrcR, {->t, ->u, ->Rd}

*Description:* Atomic Unsigned Max operation: memory value is atomically unsigned maxed with register.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_ld_umax.svg[LD.UMAX encoding,width=800]

*Group:* AMO/AMO
